instructions:
In a double boiler stir the milk chocolate, butter and vanilla until melted and smooth. Then stir in the half-
and-half gradually as it heats, but do not boil. Serve in a mug over about 10 miniature marshmallows and
garnish with a dash of nutmeg.

Variations:
Substitute semisweet or white chocolate for milk chocolate. Also try adding liqueurs; Kahlua with milk
chocolate, Cointreau with semisweet chocolate or
peppermint schnapps with white chocolate.
name: Hot Chocolate To Die For
creator: The Frugal Gourmet
